body_html:
Ah I think the issue seems to be the quote:

Without quote:


C:\Users\user\tensorflow>C:\msys64\usr\bin\bash.exe -l -c patch -p1 -d C:/users/user/_bazel_user/4opxzgxi/external/png_archive -i C:/users/user/tensorflow/third_party/png_fix_rpi.patch

Ctrl-C to break as it hangs

With quote:

C:\Users\user\tensorflow>C:\msys64\usr\bin\bash.exe -l -c "patch -p1 -d C:/users/user/_bazel_user/4opxzgxi/external/png_archive -i C:/users/user/tensorflow/third_party/png_fix_rpi.patch"
patching file scripts/pnglibconf.h.prebuilt

C:\Users\user\tensorflow>

body:
Ah I think the issue seems to be the quote:

Without quote:
```

C:\Users\user\tensorflow>C:\msys64\usr\bin\bash.exe -l -c patch -p1 -d C:/users/user/_bazel_user/4opxzgxi/external/png_archive -i C:/users/user/tensorflow/third_party/png_fix_rpi.patch
```

*Ctrl-C to break as it hangs*

With quote:
```
C:\Users\user\tensorflow>C:\msys64\usr\bin\bash.exe -l -c "patch -p1 -d C:/users/user/_bazel_user/4opxzgxi/external/png_archive -i C:/users/user/tensorflow/third_party/png_fix_rpi.patch"
patching file scripts/pnglibconf.h.prebuilt

C:\Users\user\tensorflow>
```
